name: Fart-o-meter
0:
”Alexa ask rate my fart to rate my fart”
”Alexa, open rate my fart”
”help”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rate my fart
des:
Introducing the Fart-o-meter skill for Alexa! With this skill, you can rate your farts based on a variety of hilarious metrics, from the Stinky Scale to the Rump Roar Meter. Simply say 'Alexa, ask the Fart-o-meter to rate my fart' and our cutting-edge algorithm will analyze the sound and smell of your fart to determine its rating. Whether you're trying to impress your friends or just want to keep track of your personal best, the Fart-o-meter skill is the perfect way to take your fart game to the next level!

Please note this is a joke skill and we can't really analyze your farts....at least not yet.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
